item.description:
Our Aura’s reflect our physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual states. When we are happy our Aura’s expand and when we are sad our Aura’s contract. They also tell other Aura’s who we really are and what’s going on with us. Much like your fingerprint, no two are exactly the same. And when we are around other people, our Aura’s interact with each other. Join Lori Otto as she explains and defines Aura’s, shows how to recognize them and teaches how to use and change them. This interactive class will be fun and informative! 

Lori is an awesome teacher! Please come and hear this life changing informational meeting. I apolozige for the scheduling issue!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Learning How to Read Your Aura!- PLEASE note date chage
